sentences.english: In what ways is such questioning relevant today anyway?
sentences.chinese: 卟菅咋樣，這種質詢法媞苡啥方式影響到當偂？

sentences.english: Part two. Comparatively study of the interpellation system abroad.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分是國外質詢制度的比較研究。

sentences.english: Factorization works well enough for interactive challenges.
sentences.chinese: 對交互式質詢來說，因數分解足以勝任。

sentences.english: Hon choy so-yuk raised a question on demolition project for the old star ferry pier clock tower.
sentences.chinese: 蔡素玉議員就舊天星碼頭鐘樓拆卸工程提出一項質詢。

sentences.english: The Indian military has been set up to investigate the matter the court question.
sentences.chinese: 印度軍方已經成立質詢法庭調查此事。

sentences.english: There is nothing like a public flogging to get the people on your side.
sentences.chinese: 沒有什麼比公開質詢更能讓人們站在你這一邊。

sentences.english: It is the revolution and consummation of interpellation system in our country.
sentences.chinese: 第四部分是我國質詢制度的改革完善。

sentences.english: A random resource could be issued as the challenge on this guardian screen.
sentences.chinese: 可以生成一個隨機資源來作爲這個保護屏幕的質詢。

sentences.english: Deputies to the People's Congresses have the right to address inquiries to state organs.
sentences.chinese: 人民代表大會代表有權向國家機關提出質詢。

sentences.english: The pre-race inquiries have become as routine as the postrace drug screens.
sentences.chinese: 賽前質詢已經像賽後藥檢一樣是家常便飯了。

sentences.english: Hon Audrey EU raised a question on the Funding Scheme for Workplace English Training.
sentences.chinese: 餘若薇議員就職業英語培訓資助計劃提出質詢。

sentences.english: Mr Chen, divested of presidential immunity, now faces a corruption investigation.
sentences.chinese: 陳生被剝奪了總桶豁免權，面臨貪污質詢。

sentences.english: Hon Audrey EU raised a question on indoor air quality.
sentences.chinese: 餘若薇議員就室內空氣質素提出質詢。

sentences.english: Blaser questions whether eliminating H. pylori is a good idea.
sentences.chinese: 布拉斯特質詢消滅幽門螺旋桿菌是否是個好主意。

sentences.english: However, Naoto Kan answer questions when called in on the matter fully I do not know.
sentences.chinese: 但是菅直人在回答議員質詢時稱其對此事完全不知。

sentences.english: He will also face questioning on Toyota’s relationship with regulators.
sentences.chinese: 豐田章男還將面對豐田與監管機構關係的質詢。

definition: joint signatures (on a letter or declaration)
to set/to designate/to stipulate/to provide/to draw up/to formulate (rules etc)/stipulation

abbr. for 民主建港協進聯盟|民主建港协进联盟, Democratic alliance for the betterment of Hong Kong (DAB), Hong Kong pro-Beijing party
